thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com | 10 of 620
thread.title: Gayle Manio

author: Gayle Manio
title: Gayle Manio
text: YesStyle has not disappointed me in my transactions so far. I had been conducting business with them for over 2 years and I have not had any problem. Also, their customer service is remarkable. They respond immediately and they give good support. You do have to make sure to check the reviews before making a purchase because the reviewers give better details about their products, especially when the clothes are too sheer or whether you should order a size larger.
